name: Global Health Access Solutions
goal: At Global Health Access Solutions, we offer clients improved patient access for their health solutions by translating healthcare policy into impactful & tangible strategies. Our competencies include improving shareholder value and advancing the uptake of your health solutions. Creating sustainable & receptive funding environments for your organization is one of our core-strengths.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Global Health Access Solutions will follow policies and initiatives related to: access to medicines, blockchain,  digital health, European Health Technology Assesment,  pricing and reimbursement, and health insurance.
